title: 27. Girl Wash Your Hands: How Weâ€™re Navigating COVID 19
description:
Hey besties, we sat down today to talk about what's on everyone's minds - COVID 19. We talk about how we're feeling about it, how we're handling business slow down (or shut down) and how we can navigate this time of uncertainty. We are all in this together and we are here if you need us. Xoxo, Tess & Lo

As discussed in the episode: Lindsey Bremer, Facial Lounge Newport Beach CA - @lindsey_bremer_

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd
